fields.name: Identity
fields.description: Identity used to authenticate to KeyVault. Applicable if keySource is 'Microsoft.KeyVault'.

fields.name: KeySource
fields.description: The encryption keySource (provider). Possible values (case-insensitive):  Microsoft.NetApp, Microsoft.KeyVault

fields.name: KeyVaultProperties
fields.description: Properties provided by KeVault. Applicable if keySource is 'Microsoft.KeyVault'.
